title: What is the title of a song that sounded like an 80s dance metal or techno song that has a chorus that begins 'Ohwwwoh' sung by a female singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: In cases where you have some or all of the song record you may use Shazam app on your mobile ,it listens to the sound for some brief time and tells you all about it. In cases where you don’t have an audio recording you can use another app that requires you to murmur the tune before it can tell you the info you need.Try this page for five apps that can help ( Top 5 Apps for Identifying Songs ). I will come back after I locate the most important app, the one that needs you to just hum or murmur the tunes

my best guess of that terribly vague description…. This Corrosion by The Sisters of Mercy  goth metal/80s band with both a female & male singer Song starts off with a angelic choir kinda intro then kicks into this 80s goth dancy type song.
